data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

Must it be "D/R" by default or does it change to anything else according to specified validation?

This is the current validation for Debt Review that we have.

WHEN DT.DocumentType = 'Debt Review Order' AND JR.JudgementReason = 'Abandonment' THEN 'ABD'
WHEN DT.DocumentType = 'Debt Review Order' AND JR.JudgementReason = 'Cancelled' THEN 'DRC'
WHEN DT.DocumentType = 'Debt Review Order' AND JR.JudgementReason = 'Debt Review Order' THEN 'D/R'
WHEN DT.DocumentType = 'Debt Review Order' AND JR.JudgementReason = 'Discharged' THEN 'DSC'
WHEN DT.DocumentType = 'Debt Review Order' AND JR.JudgementReason = 'Offer of Compromise (Sec 311)' THEN 'OFF'
WHEN DT.DocumentType = 'Debt Review Order' AND JR.JudgementReason = 'Rescission' THEN 'RE'
WHEN DT.DocumentType = 'Debt Review Order' AND JR.JudgementReason = 'Set Aside' THEN 'S/A'
WHEN DT.DocumentType = 'Debt Review Order' AND JR.JudgementReason = 'Withdrawel' THEN 'WDL'						


There is nothing for Debt Review Application
